ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to eqpaladin@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Regarding Tynkale s Quests, you usually get a rusty haliberd from the first (Tandan Nybright or the Drunkard quest) Supposadly if you are lucky you can get a
ygData.messageBody:
Regarding Tynkale's Quests, you usually get a rusty haliberd from the first
(Tandan Nybright or the Drunkard quest) Supposadly if you are lucky you can
get a magic haili, but I think it is just a rumor, To complete that Quest go
to the Nybright Sisters's camp in Lesser Faydark, get a necklace from each
of the sisters, and yes it does matter which one you get it from, for you
can only get one from each. Take them back to the Drunkard and he gives you
the Hally.

Also welcome again to the mailing list, when I logged on to check my mail
today i was shocked at all the subscriptions. If anyone has any information
on the Holy Swords, A paladin's best friend, Please share it with us all :)

Laurana Highwind
